Package cart

Class CartManagement

java.lang.Object
cart.CartManagement
public class CartManagement extends Object
This Class is to facilitate "retrieving","adding" and "removing" Food items on the user's Cart
Since:
2024
Version:
1.0
Author:
FDAB 2
